item.title: Click https://shorturl.at/mc
item.description: Click https://shorturl.at/mcFNF || #KolkataHorror -- WB CM Mamata Banerjee announced a State Assembly session to pass a Bill mandating capital punishment for rapists

item.title: BJP President Dr. Sukanta Maju
item.description: BJP President Dr. Sukanta Majumdar sits on the road in protest during 12-hour 'Bengal Bandh' call in Kolkata. #SukantaMajumdar #BengalBandh #News VC - ANI
